title: Ather Energy partners HDFC Bank, IDFC First Bank to offer retail finance for its e-scooter - Economic Times
content: Ather Energy partners HDFC Bank, IDFC First Bank to offer retail finance for its e-scooter  Economic Times
description: IDFC and HDFC Bank offer loans to new-to-credit customers (those with no credit history), which account for roughly 20-25 per cent of the overall Ather customer base, according to Ather Energy.
